mapper.select: select id from sustc.public.container where type = #{type}

select max(b.time - c.time) service_time from sustc.public.transit b join sustc.public.transit c on ( select container_id from sustc.public.record r where r.id = c.record_id and r.container_id in (select id from sustc.public.container d where d.type = #{type}) ) = ( select container_id from sustc.public.record r where r.id = b.record_id and r.container_id in (select id from sustc.public.container d where d.type = #{type}) ) where c.type = 2 and b.type = 3;
